data.title: BBC News Gahuza
data.description: BBC Gahuza itanga amakuru yizewe yo kw’isi hamwe no mu karere

summaries.title: RD Congo: Reta yemeye ko Bukavu yafashwe n'inyeshamba za M23
summaries.description: Reta ya Congo ishimangira ko iriko irakora ibishoboka vyose kugira ngo "isubize ibintu mu buryo, igarukane umutekano n'ubusugire bwayo".
summaries.imageAlt: Ku mugoroba wo ku wa gatanu w'indwi iheze, niho abarwanyi ba M23 baboneka hagati mu gisagara ca Bukavu ahazwi nka Place de l'Independance

summaries.title: Ni ibiki birimo kuba i Bukavu?
summaries.description: Kuri iki cyumweru, hagati no mu nkengero za Bukavu habonetse imirongo miremire bivugwa ko ari iy’abarwanyi ba M23, mu gihe FARDC ivuga ko ari yo igenzura uyu mujyi.
summaries.imageAlt: Ifoto y'abarwanyi ba M23 hagati mu mujyi wa Bukavu yatangajwe n'umuvugizi w'uyu mutwe Col Willy Ngoma kuri iki cyumweru

summaries.title: Israel yakiriye ibisasu rutura bya MK-84 yohererejwe na Amerika
summaries.description: MK-84 ni bombe rutura imwe iba ipima hejuru ya 900kg, ifite ubushobozi bwo gushwanyaguza 'beton' nini n'ibyuma bikomeye kandi ikangiza byinshi ku murambararo munini.
summaries.imageAlt: Ifoto y'indege y'igisirikare cya Amerika yarekuye ibisasu byo mu byoko bwa MK-84

summaries.title: Ndayishimiye avuga ko igitero c'Urwanda ku Burundi' ari nkaho kitakibaye
summaries.description: Abategetsi b'Urwanda ntibigeze batangaza ko iki gihugu kizotera Uburundi, kandi ntaco bishuye ku majambo yatangajwe na Ndayishimiye mu ntango z'iyi ndwi.
summaries.imageAlt: Prezida Ndayishimiye mu nama rusangi y'Ubumwe bwa Afrika i Addis Abeba mu mpera z'iyi ndwi

summaries.title: Ingene nashize ahagaragara ikinyoma cya MI5 ku bugizi bwa nabi bw'intasi yayo
summaries.description: Urwo rwego rw'umutekano rwishizemwo ko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC Daniel De Simone ata vyemezo yari afise. Ivyo yari yagiye arandika, ubutumwa bwa email n'amajwi yafashe vyaberetse ko babeshe.
summaries.imageAlt: A composite image featuring a yellow-tinted photo of BBC reporter Daniel De Simone, a man wearing a suit and tie with short hair, a blue-tinted photo of the Royal Courts of Justice and part of the MI5 logo. The images are laid on a grid design with accents of yellow and blue.

summaries.title: AFC/M23 yasabye abatuye i Bukavu kwishyiriraho abategetsi
summaries.description: Abarwanyi ba M23 baragenzura umujyi wa Bukavu kuva mu ijoro ryo ku wa gatanu, nyuma y'uko abategetsi n'ingabo bahunze.
summaries.imageAlt: Bernard Byamungu (hagati avuga) umwe mu barwanyi bakuriye M23, arimo kuvugana n'abaturage b'ahitwa Katana ugana i Bukavu nyuma y'uko abo barwanyi bahafashe

summaries.title: Uko M23 'yafashe' umujyi wa Bukavu 'nta mirwano ikomeye' ibaye
summaries.description: Amasoko atandukanye yemeza ko uyu mujyi wafashwe nyuma y'uko ingabo za leta n'abategetsi ba Kivu y'Epfo bahunga, M23 ikinjira i Bukavu nta mirwano ikomeye ibaye.
summaries.imageAlt: Abarwanyi ba M23 bagaragaye hagati mu mujyi wa Bukavu ahazwi nka Place de l'Independance ku wa gatanu nimugoroba nk'uko abahatuye babyeymeza. Ifoto yo mu bubiko

summaries.title: Uwaregaga Jay-Z na Sean Diddy ko bamufashe ku ngufu yaretse ikirego cye
summaries.description: Mu itangazo, Jay-Z yavuze ko iki kirego cyateye ihungabana kuri we, umugore we, n'abana be hamwe n'abakunzi be.
summaries.imageAlt: Jay-Z yavuze ko ikurwaho ry'iki kirego ari "intsinzi" kuri we

summaries.title: Imvo n'Imvano: Divin na Jesus mu gikorwa co kwibutsa no kwigisha ururimi kavukire mu ndirimbo i Buraya
summaries.description: Divin Bandura hamwe na Jesus Marie Joseph Kabyinabuhiye, bashinze umurwi witwa Green Lions.
summaries.imageAlt: Divin Bandora na Jesus Kavyinabuhiye

summaries.title: M23 yafashe ikibuga c'indege ca Kavumu mu buseruko bwa RDC
summaries.description: Umuhari M23 wafashe iki buga c'indege ca Kavumu mu gihe amakungu akomeza guhamagarira Urwanda kuva mu buseruko bwa Congo, imopande zirwana zigasubira mu biganiro vy'amahoro
summaries.imageAlt: Abantu bahagaze mu mugwi, mu mwambaro wa gisirikare

summaries.title: HRW isaba abafite Goma gufata impunzi bya kimuntu
summaries.description: Mu itangazo, Human Rights Watch ivuga ko abaturage babarirwa mu bihumbi bahatiwe n'umutwe wa M23 kuva mu nkambi bari bahungiyemo kandi bakorewe ibyaha by'ubugome
summaries.imageAlt: Impunzi mu hafi ya Goma

summaries.title: Red No. 3 Dye: Sobanukirwa iri rangi ritemewe henshi mu bifungurwa
summaries.description: Red No. 3 turisanga mu bifungurwa birenga 3000 bashaka ko bigaragara neza.
summaries.imageAlt: Maraschino cherries

summaries.title: Ja ku rubuga lite rutazimba
summaries.description: Hindura uje ku rubuga ruciririrkiye rwa BBC News Gahuza
summaries.imageAlt: Hindura uje ku rubuga ruciririrkiye rwa BBC News Gahuza

curations.title: Urashaka kuziganya uburyo ukoresha kuri internet?

summaries.title: BBC GAHUZA WhatsApp Channel: Uko wayinjiramo ukajya ubona amakuru ako kanya
summaries.imageAlt: WhatsApp

summaries.title: F1 'ikurikiranye' intambara muri DRC n'impungenge kuri Grand Prix mu Rwanda
summaries.description: Formula 1 ivuga ko irimo "gukurikiranira hafi" intambara mu burasirazuba bwa DR Congo bigendanye no kuba u Rwanda rwarasabye kwakira Grand Prix.
summaries.imageAlt: Ibihembo bya FIA Awards byatangiwe mu Rwanda mu Ukuboza gushize

summaries.title: Umwami wa Yorodaniya yanse umugambi wa Trump wo kuvana  Abanyapalestina muri Gaza
summaries.description: Umwami  Abdullah yiyamirije umugambi w'uko abanya-Gaza bimurirwa mu bihugu bibanyi harimwo na Yorodaniya.
summaries.imageAlt: US President Donald Trump meets with Jordan's King Abdullah at the White House in Washington. The king is smiling and you can see both the US and Jordanian flags.

summaries.title: M23 'yafashe Kalehe centre na Ihusi', FARDC iramagana guhonyora agahenge
summaries.description: Imirwano yatumye abaturage ibihumbi bahungira mu byerekezo bitandukanye birimo ku kirwa cya Idjwi mu kiyaga cya Kivu, abandi berekeza i Bukavu.
summaries.imageAlt: Ku wa gatatu abarwanyi ba M23 babonetse ku biro bikuru bya teritwari ya Karehe

summaries.title: Nyuma ya Tshisekedi, abakuru ba Kiliziya Gatolika n'Abaporotestanti babonanye na M23
summaries.description: Mu cyumweru gishize aba banyamadini bakiriwe na Perezida Thisekedi bamuha 'umushinga wo gusohoka mu ngorane', bavuga ko yawakiriye neza.
summaries.imageAlt: Corneille Nangaa (hagati) hamwe n'abakuru b'amadini baje kuganira na AFC/M23 i Goma, bayobowe na Musenyeri Donatien Nshole (iburyo)

summaries.title: DR Congo: Umurwi w'abitwaje ibirwanisho wagandaguye abarenga 50 muri Ituri
summaries.description: Umuvugizi w'igisirikare muri iyo ntara, Jules Ngongo, avuga ko abasirikare bagerageje gutabara ariko ko bahashitse akaba kabaye, ataco bagikiza.
summaries.imageAlt: Inkoho

summaries.title: Rwanda: Imisoro ku nzoga n'itabi igiye kuzamurwa na telephone zishyure umusoro wa TVA
summaries.description: Izi mpinduka zisobanuye ko telephone yaguraga 100,000 Frw ishobora kuzamuka ikagera ku 118,000Frw cyangwa hejuru yayo gato.
summaries.imageAlt: Ishusho y'inzoga na telephone

summaries.title: Kanda wumve
summaries.description: Umva ibiganiro vya BBC Gahuza ikibiriraho (live) kuwa mbere gushika ku gatanu isaha 1730 GMT, no kuwa gatandatu 0600 GMT & 0900 GMT no kuwa Mungu 0630 GMT & 1600 GMT.
summaries.imageAlt: BBC microphone

summaries.title: "Ibibera ku mupaka si bishya, byabaye ngombwa ko u Rwanda rubibamo"
summaries.imageAlt: Yolande Makolo, uvugira reta y'u Rwanda.

summaries.title: Ku byo DRC irega u Rwanda, urubanza ruzakworoha?
summaries.imageAlt: Urubanza rwa DRC irega u Rwanda rwatangijwe mu 2023 i Arusha.

summaries.title: FDLR: abari muri uwo mutwe baharanira iki, bafashwa na bande?
summaries.imageAlt: Aba FDLR bavuga ko bagwanira demokarasi mu Rwanda.

summaries.title: Goma, mu gisagara abanyeshule baracatinya kuja kw'ishule
summaries.imageAlt: Abana barenga umuliyoni, ivyigwa vyabo birazingamitswe n'intambara, m'uburaruko bwa Kivu.

summaries.title: Amakuru ya Gahuzamiryango
summaries.description: Amakuru yo hirya no hino yibanda cyane cyane ku karere k'ibiyaga bigari muri Afrika, n'amakuru mpuzamakungu.
summaries.imageAlt: Microphone

summaries.title: Imvo n'Imvano
summaries.description: Ikiganiro gicukumbuye ku bibazo bitandukanye.
summaries.imageAlt: BBC News

summaries.title: Imvo n'imvano ku ishuri ryigisha ururimi n'umuco nyarwanda ryashinzwe n'Abanyarwanda i Liège mu Bubiligi
summaries.description: Ubu Ububiligi bufite Abanyarwanda bagera ku bihumbi 45, abenshi bagiye mu ntarangiriro z'umwaka w'i 1990 hatangiye intambara FPR-INKOTANYI yagabye mu Rwanda ku butegetsi bwa nyakwigendera Juvenal Habyarimana.
summaries.imageAlt: Abatumire ba Felin Gakwaya (Uva ibumoso ujya iburyo): umuyobozi w'icyo kigo, Eric Twagirimana, umwe mu barimu babo, Christophe Ikitegetse hamwe n'umwe mu babyeyi babo Marie Claire Mukashyaka

summaries.title: Imvo n'imvano: Impamvu hatubahirizwa amasezerano yo guhagarika imirwano yagizwe hagati ya leta ya Congo na leta y'u Rwanda
summaries.description: Umutwe wa M23 ubu wigaruriye n'umujyi wa Goma nubwo hakivugwa umutekano muke mu duce tumwe tw'uwo mujyi.
summaries.imageAlt: Ingabo ku rugamba muri Congo

summaries.title: Taylor Swift, Lionel Messi, Jay-Z na Trump mu byamamare byabonetse kuri Super Bowl
summaries.description: Super Bowl ni umwe mu mikino ikomeye ku isi, uwaraye ubereye muri New Orleans muri Amerika Philadelphia Eagles yatsinze amanota 40-22 kuri Kansas City Chiefs.
summaries.imageAlt: Taylor Swift - ari hagati y'abahanzi bavukana bazwi nka Haim - areba umukunzi we Travis Kelce ukinira ikipe ya Chiefs akina Super Bowl ye ya kabiri

summaries.title: Trump yemeje itegeko ribuza abishira mu bagore bavutse ari abagabo gukina inkino z'abagore
summaries.description: Trump avuga ko iyi ngingo ije gutunganiriza abagore mu bijanye n'inkino, ariko abaharanira agateka ka zina muntu barayiyamiriza.
summaries.imageAlt: Igihe yatera igikumu kuri iri tegeko, yatangaje ati: "intambara ku nkino z'abagore irarangiye"

summaries.title: 'Indoto z'umupira n'ubugwizatunga' - Ronaldo ntata hasi ku myaka 40
summaries.description: Cristiano Ronaldo ahimbaza imyaka 40 y'amavuka kandi nta cerekana ko agiye guhagarika gukina ubu vuba.
summaries.imageAlt: Cristiano Ronaldo yigina igitsindo yinjirije  Portugal

summaries.title: 'Nta mugambi wo kuvana Road World Championships mu Rwanda' - UCI
summaries.description: Urunani rw'amashirahamwe yo gusiganwa n'ikinga UCI rumenyesha ko ata mugambi rufise wo kwimura ihiganwa ry'uyu mwaka wa 2025 riteganywa kubera mu Rwanda n'ubwo hari intambara mu gihugu kibanyi ca R D Congo.
summaries.imageAlt: Abanonotsi babiri basiganwa ku makinga, umwe yambaye agapira k'ubururu, uwundi akera, n'amabutura yirabura bari ku makinga mw'ibarabara rya Kigali aho haboneka imodoka inyuma yabo

summaries.title: Podcast: Imvo n'Imvano
summaries.description: Ikiganiro mpaka ku bibazo bitandukanye
summaries.imageAlt: Podcast: Imvo n'Imvano

summaries.title: Podcast: Ikiganiro cy’abagore
summaries.description: Ikiganiro cy’abagore
summaries.imageAlt: Ikiganiro cy’abagore

summaries.title: Podcast: Amakuru ya BBC Gahuzamiryango
summaries.description: Amakuru y'akarere na mpuzamakungu mutegurirwa na BBC Gahuzamiryango
summaries.imageAlt: Amakuru ya BBC Gahuzamiryango

summaries.title: Podcast: Ikinamico Urunana
summaries.description: Teramana na BBC Gahuzamiryango mu kinamico Urunana
summaries.imageAlt: Ikinamico Urunana

summaries.title: Podcast: Baza Muganga
summaries.description: Mubaza ibibazo mufise ku vy'amagara, Muganga akabaha inyishu kuri BBC Gahuzamiryango
summaries.imageAlt: Baza Muganga

summaries.imageAlt: WhatsApp

summaries.title: Uhora ugira ibibazo vyo kuja ku rubuga rwa BBC Gahuza? Ubu ni uburyo wokoresha
summaries.description: Birashika abantu mu bihugu bimwe bimwe canke uturere bakagira ibibazo vyo kuja ku mbuga za BBC ahanini bitewe n'uko haba hari abazizibiye, ariko hariho uburyo bwo gukemura ico kibazo.
summaries.imageAlt: BBC Gahuza
